name: Trasher Planet (MrGooox, Deer, scarwoo)
description:
The Meeple People have a trash problem and they need you to fix it!

Their planet was destroyed by their own doing, trashing their home away. They couldn’t be bothered to pick it up themselves, so they created you, TR4SH-R, to fix it all for them!

Vacuum the trash away and recycle it to make your Meeple overmasters happy. But beware: as time goes by, the Meeple will multiply and make your job harder and harder. How long can you keep up?

Use WASD to move the camera.

B to open the build mode.

M to check the list of your Meeples.

Use Left-click to vacuum trash and drop it into a recycling plant. Use water purifiers to clean the toxic waters and plant trees in tree farm to clean smog-filled clouds. And make sure all Meeples have houses to live in, homeless Meeples produce twice as much trash.

How long can you keep up?
